title: Meta Genie Is Coming Soon: What We Are Building Next
excerpt: We are actively building Meta Genie and preparing rollout. Here is what it will include first, who gets access early, and what to expect next.
content:
## Quick Summary

Meta Genie is our next rollout, and it is designed to unify Threads, Instagram, and YouTube execution in one practical workspace.

## Why Meta Genie Exists

Right now, teams still jump between tools for planning, writing, approvals, scheduling, and tracking performance across Meta platforms and YouTube. That fragmentation slows output and lowers quality.

Meta Genie is being built to fix that with one connected operating flow for Threads, Instagram, and YouTube.

## What You Can Expect in the First Rollout

Initial focus areas:
- Unified publishing workflow across Threads, Instagram, and YouTube
- Shared calendar and execution visibility
- Better approval and collaboration flow for teams
- Cleaner tracking of what is drafted, approved, and published

## Rollout Plan

We are taking a staged release approach to keep quality high.

- Stage 1: Internal hardening and controlled production checks
- Stage 2: Early access for selected active users (Threads invite-only while app is under review)
- Stage 3: Broader release once reliability targets are met

## Platform Status

- **Threads**: Complete but invite-only while the app is under Meta review
- **Instagram & YouTube**: In production and ready for use

## Who Should Care Most

- Agencies handling multiple client pipelines across Meta platforms and YouTube
- Creators running consistent weekly publishing systems
- Teams that want one place for planning and execution across these platforms

## What Happens Next

As we get closer to release, we will publish:
- Early access criteria
- Detailed feature walkthroughs
- Migration guidance for existing workflows

Meta Genie is close, and we are focused on shipping it right, not rushing it out.

faq.question: Is Meta Genie already available to all users?
faq.answer: Not yet. It is in active rollout preparation with staged access to ensure release quality and reliability.

faq.question: Will Meta Genie replace Tweet Genie and LinkedIn Genie?
faq.answer: No. Meta Genie is specifically for Threads, Instagram, and YouTube, complementing our existing Tweet Genie and LinkedIn Genie tools for a complete multi-platform solution.
